message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that's worth a lot to me. I'm offering it to you for $95.  It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay $85 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $85 just isn't enough for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but how about $90? It's still a great price considering the value of this product. Let's make this happen!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I can only pay $87 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
